operator.name: GendRE Genderizer
operator.synopsis: GendRE infers the gender from international names.
operator.help: This operator infers the gender from international names (male/female), calling the GendRE API (Free or Freemium). Input: firstName, lastName and (optionally) a country Iso2 code, a batchId. Output: genderScale [-1..0..+1=Female] and gender {Male,Female,Unknown}. GendRE can use both the firstName and lastName (ex. for Slavic names, to deambiguate names like Andrea male in Italy, female in the US). More info on http://namsor.com/api
